text:
frightening	at	first	
if you are sore or cannot feel 
what you are doing. Drinking 
lots of water dilutes your urine, 
but	if	it	is	difficult	to	pass	urine,	
tell your midwife.
You probably will not need to 
open your bowels for a few 
days after the birth, but it’s 
important not to let yourself 
become constipated. Eat fresh 
fruit, vegetables, salad and 
wholemeal bread and cereals, 
and drink plenty of water. 
Whatever it may feel like, it’s 
very unlikely that you will break 
the stitches o
